args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: Thank you to Hal Lambert for his very strong words of wisdom during a Neil Cavuto interview on FoxNews. I especially liked his strong support for JD Vance, who has really come on strong, and is doing a fantastic job of exposing the Country threatening dangers of Kamala and her absolutely horrible V.P. choice. Would be the destruction of our Country as we know it!!!
